Title: RHSA-2019:2177: sssd security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Moderate)
Description:
The System Security Services Daemon (SSSD) service provides a set of daemons to manage access to remote directories and authentication mechanisms. It also provides the Name Service Switch (NSS) and the Pluggable Authentication Modules (PAM) interfaces toward the system, and a pluggable back-end system to connect to multiple different account sources.

The following packages have been upgraded to a later upstream version: sssd (1.16.4). (BZ#1658994)

Security Fix(es):

* sssd: fallback_homedir returns '/' for empty home directories in passwd file (CVE-2019-3811)

* sssd: improper implementation of GPOs due to too restrictive permissions (CVE-2018-16838)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.7 Release Notes linked from the References section.

Bugzillas.Title: [RFE] return multiple server addresses to the Kerberos locator plugin
kinit / sssd kerberos fail over
[RFE] Make 2FA prompting configurable
sssd service is starting before network service
SSSD netgroups do not honor entry_cache_nowait_percentage
sssd only sets the SELinux login context if it differs from the default
KCM: kinit: Matching credential not found while getting default ccache
CVE-2018-16838 sssd: improper implementation of GPOs due to too restrictive permissions
Slow ldb search causes blocking during startup which might cause the registration to time out
sss_cache shouldn't return ENOENT when no entries match
CVE-2019-3811 sssd: fallback_homedir returns '/' for empty home directories in passwd file
Rebase SSSD to 1.16.x
User is unable to perform sudo as a user on IPA Server, even though `sudo -l` shows permissions to do so
sssd_krb5_locator_plugin introduces delay in cifs.upcall krb5 calls
NSS responder does no refresh domain list when busy
IPA: Deleted user from trusted domain is not removed properly from the cache on IPA clients
filter_users option is not applied to sub-domains if SSSD starts offline
The HBAC code requires dereference to be enabled and fails otherwise
UPN negative cache does not use values from 'filter_users' config option
Extend cached_auth_timeout to cover subdomains / trusts
Error accessing files on samba share randomly
The server error message is not returned if password change fails
The files provider does not handle resetOffline properly
